text:
ce="preserve">Group C of the 2018 FIFA World Cup took place from 16 to 26 June 2018. The group consisted of France, Australia, Peru, and Denmark. The top two teams advanced to the round of 16.
Matches.
All times listed are local time.
France vs Australia.
The two teams have played four time before the most recently was a friendly in 2013, and France won 6-0.
